statList.Name: Strength
statList.Description: Determines which weapons a character can use

statList.Name: Dexterity
statList.Description: A measure of a character's attack, movement speed, and accuracy.

statList.Name: Constitution
statList.Description: A measure of how sturdy a character is

statList.Name: Intelligence
statList.Description: A measure of a character's problem-solving ability.

statList.Name: Wisdom
statList.Description: A measure of a character's common sense and/or spirituality.

statList.Name: Charisma
statList.Description: A measure of a characters social skills
